Uses of Package
hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc

  • Packages that use hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc 
    Package Description
    hrw.swenpr.bomberman.client  
    hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common  
    hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc  
    hrw.swenpr.bomberman.server  
    hrw.swenpr.bomberman.server.thread  
  • Classes in hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc used by hrw.swenpr.bomberman.client 
    Class and Description
    Bomb
    C <=> S Bomb is sent from the client to the server, when the user places a bomb.
    Bomb.BombType
    Defines the bomb types.
    Level
    Represents a level with its name and size, but no further information of the level.
    User
    C <= S User is sent from the server to every client, when a new User is logged in or a round or game ended to update the score.
    UserDead
    C <= S UserDead is sent from the server to all clients, when one user dies from a bomb.
    UserPosition
    C <=> S UserPosition is sent from the client to the server, when a user moves his player.
    UserRemove
    C <=> S UserRemove is sent from a client to the server, when he leaves the game/closes the software.
  • Classes in hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc used by hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common 
    Class and Description
    Bomb.BombType
    Defines the bomb types.
    User
    C <= S User is sent from the server to every client, when a new User is logged in or a round or game ended to update the score.
    User.UserColor
    Defines the colors of the users.
  • Classes in hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc used by hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc 
    Class and Description
    Bomb.BombType
    Defines the bomb types.
    ErrorMessage.ErrorType 
    Header
    Header for every data packet send over socket.
    Level
    Represents a level with its name and size, but no further information of the level.
    MessageType
    Defines all types of the RFC.
    User.UserColor
    Defines the colors of the users.
  • Classes in hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc used by hrw.swenpr.bomberman.server 
    Class and Description
    Level
    Represents a level with its name and size, but no further information of the level.
    User
    C <= S User is sent from the server to every client, when a new User is logged in or a round or game ended to update the score.
  • Classes in hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc used by hrw.swenpr.bomberman.server.thread 
    Class and Description
    LevelSelection
    C <=> S LevelSelection is sent from the client of the gamemaster to the server, when he selected a level.
    TimeSelection
    C <=> S TimeSelection is sent from the client of the gamemaster to the server, when he selected the time (5, 10 or 15 minutes) for the game.
    UserDead
    C <= S UserDead is sent from the server to all clients, when one user dies from a bomb.
    UserRemove
    C <=> S UserRemove is sent from a client to the server, when he leaves the game/closes the software.
